bwwExcerpt: A tiresome new bio-musical at Circle in the Square, "Soul Doctor" does not appear too long for this cruel Broadway world...Wise's clunky script sporadically features the charismatic rabbi's unlikely friendship with jazz stylist Nina Simone, a rebel in her own musical right...Although the premise holds some promise, Wise's repetitive two-act book is a drag while a curious sameness among the rhythms of Carlebach's music ultimately proves to be more wearying than catchy...The show, which also is di
